==Translingual==
{{stroke order|type=animate}}

===Etymology===
Originally a variant of [[幺]]. This eventually gave rise to the compound [[麽]] (itself a variant of 麼), originally ''mó'' ("small") but later used for the interrogative particle ''me'' (as in [[什麽]] ''shénme'', [[怎麽]] ''zěnme'', etc.). And {{Han simp|麽|f=麻|t=&nbsp;}} component from ''me'', but retains it in ''mó'' (as in [[幺麽]] ''yāomó'', "insignificant").
